Definition.WordDefinition: Excelsior, MN (city, FIPS 20078) Location: 44.90065 N, 93.56651 W Population (1990): 2367 (1255 housing units) Area: 1.6 sq km (land), 0.1 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 55331 Excelsior, PA Zip code(s): 17872

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Excelsior \Ex*cel"si*or\, a. [L., compar. of excelsus elevated, lofty, p. p. of excellere. See {Excel}, v. t.] More lofty; still higher; ever upward. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Excelsior \Ex*cel"si*or\, n. A kind of stuffing for upholstered furniture, mattresses, etc., in which curled shreds of wood are substituted for curled hair. [1913 Webster]
excelsior n : thin curly wood shavings used for packing or stuffing [syn: {wood shavings}]
